Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
Name: group_replication_get_write_concurrency()
Description:
Check the maximum number of consensus instances that a
              group can execute in parallel.
Press CTRL+C to copy INT group_replication_get_write_concurrency()

The maximum number of consensus instances currently set
              for the group.
Press CTRL+C to copy SELECT group_replication_get_write_concurrency()

For more information, see
              Section 20.5.1.3, “Using Group Replication Group Write Consensus”.
